text.en: Embodiment of the wisdom of all the victors throughout the whole of space and time,
text.en-trans: chok dü gyalwa kün gyi yeshe ku

text.en: Supreme sovereign of the oceanic teachings in their entirety,
Khyentse Wangpo, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: khyentsé wangpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: The magical play of his primordial wisdom,
text.en-trans: gang gi yeshe gyumé namrol lé

text.en: The protector who trains beings through ocean-like activity,
Mañjughoṣa guru, Chökyi Lodrö, to you
I pray from the depths of my heart: inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: May our faith and samaya commitment remain utterly pure,
text.en-trans: dakchak dé dang damtsik nampar dak

text.en: May we complete the path of the two stages,2
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam gyi dröpa tarchin té

text.en: May the sun of co-emergent wisdom dawn within our hearts,
text.en-trans: lhenkyé yeshe nyima nying la char

text.en: And may all be auspicious for the twofold aim to be perfectly fulfilled.3
text.en-trans: dön nyi ta ru chinpé tashi shok
